contentList.content: Attacking Recklessly
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> until the end of your turn, but enemies also have Advantage against you.

When you make your first <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing Attack Rolls during this turn, but Attack Rolls against you have Advantage until your next turn.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> on their turn, and any Attack Roll against them has Advantage.

You've trained to strike swift and true.

When you land a Critical Hit with your melee or thrown Attack, you roll an extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical dice.

You've trained to strike swift and true.

When you land a Critical Hit with your melee or thrown Attack, you roll two extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical dice.

You've trained to strike swift and true.

When you land a Critical Hit with your melee or thrown Attack, you roll three extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical dice.

You sense when things aren't as they should be.

You have Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

To gain this benefit, you can't be Blinded or Incapacitated.
End your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag>.
Rage Sustained
Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> will not end this turn.
You can use the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> feature.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and while throwing objects.

Has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> turns into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE_FRENZY">Frenzy</LSTag>! You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FrenziedStrike">Frenzied Strike</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_FrenziedThrow">Enraged Throw</LSTag>. You can also make an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_ImprovisedWeaponBerserker">Improvised Weapon Attack</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Also has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, you can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FerociousAppetite">Unrelenting Ferocity</LSTag>, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage except[1].
You can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FerociousAppetite">Unrelenting Ferocity</LSTag>, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage except[1].

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Has Resistance to all damage except[2], and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

While Raging, you can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash as a Bonus Action.

You can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash as a Bonus Action.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Can use Dash as a Bonus Action, and foes have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks.

Also has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Movement speed increased by [2].

Also has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Jump distance increased by [2].

Also has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

Allies have Advantage on melee Attack Rolls against enemies within [2].

Also has Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.

Raging and increased in size. Deals an additional [1] damage with melee and improvised weapons, and [2] damage when throwing objects.

Also has Resistance to physical damage and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Cannot cast or concentrate on spells.
